website_summaries.verdict: In addition to quality and durability, it's a powerful tool that's easy to use and built by a manufacturer known for reliable floor jacks.
pros: A rugged yet fairly lightweight aluminum jack
Capable of fitting under low chassis, yet powerful enough to lift 3 tons
Easy to use w/smooth-moving wheels and extra-padded lift arm
cons: Some jacks with issues have been reported, but the 1-year warranty provides peace of mind

customer_reviews.title: Great looking jack. Super poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival the rear crater was froze and would not swivel causing the back wheel to drag instead and leaving marks on the ground. Called Arcan on three direct occasions and took 15 min+ on hold each day and no rep to answer the phone. Finally got a hold of a service rep and two months later and three different promised ETA still no rear caster.
customer_reviews.author: porang dadras

customer_reviews.title: Does work Now after another Hydraulic fluid topped off
customer_reviews.text: March 22, 2019 the return item deadline triggered. Today trying to lift car and it makes squishing sounds and does not lift. followed the instructions and it worked for a few lifts. Would like a replacement and not a shipping and repair bill. After another topping off the Hydraulic fluid the Jack works just fine now. It seems that it can’t be stored any other way than flat on its wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Greer Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good Jack For a Decent Price
customer_reviews.text: Well so far only used it once for the photos. But this bad boy is big and seems strong. Much better quality than my cheap $120 one from Tractor Supply. I replaced it as 1.5ton wasnt cutting it and the seals were leaking. The picture seen of it lifting a purple car was 10 pumps from resting. Didn't take much force to lift the cars front end. I'd also note at 10 pumps for a minor lift up it's by no means a speed demon, but rather built for ease of use. Please remember to always use jack stands, hydraulics can fail at any moment. I will update my review after some good time and add below.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jack.....
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this jack...... I had a very similar all steel jack that I let m cousin have when I was going through my divorce. He's a mechanic and was routinely fixing my vehicles. So I let him have my jack while I was between homes..... Now I'm all settled in and replacing things. I did a lot of research and decided to go with this jack. I'm VERY impressed.... It's much lighter than my old jack...... operates very smoothly...... easy to ease it down when I lower it.... I can raise a 3/4 ton truck with no problem. Its built very tough..... I suspect this is the last jack I'll ever need.....
customer_reviews.author: HappyaftertheDivorce!

customer_reviews.title: A JACK TO TURN AN ORDINARY MAN INTO  THE ENVY OF THE BLOCK, SUPERIOR PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this jack a lot and it is a TOP performer! Fast to lift, safe to hold, and beautiful to own! I know that doesn't sound very manly, so let me conclude by stating that this jack will make a "girly man" into a "Manly man" and make all the ladies go: "Oooooo my"!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Solid design but poor quality control all bolts loose one wheel wouldnt roll after hour of adjustments works great but i cant give it 5 stars when i have to make numberious adjustments to make it work as intended
customer_reviews.author: b Dr fg

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. It is a quality product, lifts very quickly with each action, more then what you would expect. And it releases very smooth and careful as long as you are equally careful when you turn the knob. It is not as heavy as others, but it does have some weight, and it should as it has to elevate a lot of mass. Overall very pleased with it, just wish it wasn't so costly but was the best price I could find. If you need one, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: Big, slow, and tough as nails.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Bare metal finish should hold up well. Aluminum Handle is super lightweight (Makes strokes faster, this is relevant to one of my Dislikes) Solid, sturdy construction Almost 20”, I’m able to use notches on my jack-stands that my 1.5t didn’t come close. Dislikes: Very slow to full up (feels like 20pumps+)
customer_reviews.author: SC/DC

customer_reviews.title: great jack
customer_reviews.text: awesome jack. the only problem i have is with the shipping. when i received it, the box was messed up . i opened it up an one of the rear wheels were smashed in so it would not spin freely. didn't want to go threw an ship it back just to get another damaged jack. i just pounded the wheel where it swivels so it could spin freely again. i love the jack though. speed lift. lifts my 04 f250 no problem. and the low profile is gret for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit under my car
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good jack. The issue I have is that it doesn't fit under my car. I have a reasonably low Mustang. I have previously driven up on 2x4s to get it high enough to roll a jack underneath the k-member. That is what I was trying to fix with this jack. Although the lifting pad is low enough (which is the part I checked when ordering), the back of the jack is so tall it hits my front air dam long before it gets to the k-member. So, if you are looking for a low-profile jack, order a different jack.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3/4/20 but do not jack up the car I want to return but it was over 30 days so I lost almost $300 for nothing
customer_reviews.author: david kim

customer_reviews.title: Stable, light, solid feeling, better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Best jack I've ever had, this is my third. Stable, yet light enough to move around with my feet to different angles when moving it around the garage, especially when I have to move it into my storage when I'm not using it. Not the quickest jack to lift up a jack, but love the wide saddle as it gives me confidence of a stable lifting point on any car I use it on.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ogawa

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the third use.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this jack was great until it broke on the third use, hence the poor review. Paid good money for this jack so it’s a bit painful having it break so quickly. Reached out to Arcan over a week ago but have not heard back. The jack handle no longer locks when twisted to the right, it just spins and spins, therefore it no longer holds weight. All I lifted wo Th it was my wife’s Jeep Renegade once, and my Jeep Gladiator once.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Rodola

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews online and on Amazon regarding the Arcan ALJ3T 3-Ton Quick Rise Aluminum Floor Jack, I felt confident I was going to receive a high quality product that would last. Well, unfortunately, during its first use, the jack will not support weight and will not lock the pump. The floor jack is totally useless. I even had to pull the emergency scissor jack from my truck to complete my project I was working on, because this jack failed. I have sent an email and called Arcan customer service and technical support several times regarding a warranty claim on this unit but, I haven't received a response. A complete waste of good money!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bello

customer_reviews.title: Arcan 3ton jack
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this jack for a few years now and I’ve only used maybe three times I was trying to jack up my truck and the handle keep lifting on the jack and it start to loose it’s pressure not very good for as expensive as it was very dissatisfied would not buy again very cheap Chinese jack and it’s heavy for aluminum
customer_reviews.author: bill ice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece and it past my first test
customer_reviews.text: Jack arrived on time, well packed and looks to be very well made. Assembly is basically installing the handle. Immediately after taking it out of t;he box I jacked the front end of my 4 WD Silverado until both whees were off the ground. After sitting 24 hours the jack was still holding the truck up perfectly, absolutely no leak down. Jack has an extra long handle and lifts the front of a Silverado effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This Jack is very heavy! It's a lot heavier than I thought since I use it to be portable, but I'm sure it's a lot lighter than an all steel jack with the same specs! It's very smooth to use and makes all my automotive projects much easier than they've ever been before. It's smooth to lift and smooth to lower the car. No jerky Movement. It's worth spending the extra money to buy this jack and then not have to think about buying another Jack again for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: What's the "Hold Up?"
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give a five star rating, is I haven't used it enough for an honest to goodness test. That being said, I was careful to follow directions after reading other reviews in hopes of avoiding problems. Thanks to all who reviewed by the way...very helpful. It came in good packaging, on time, and as advertised. I didn't have any leaks or mess and I am impressed with its looks and weight. I have only changed tires on golf carts so far which was not much of a task for this heavy duty machine. Anyway, I like it I'm happy and it's holding up!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Creek Golf

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT LAST A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: Less the one year, leaking used 7 times in the year. I will attempt to get Warrant help.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight, Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this 3 ton jack. I'm in auto restoration and have used the Jet 3 Ton jack for the past 18 years and worked great but as I'm getting older the heavy Jet floor jack has been harder to move around and takes 20 or more pumps to get to the Hight I need, This Arcan jack is easy to move around and with a few pumps less than the Jet the vehicle is at the desired height to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Floor Jack - Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jack in March 2017. Solid aluminum, solidly and heavyly built. As with all heavy duty floor jacks, the solid wheels are small, and we all know without a load the jack is easily moved, however on a rough surface the jack as most floor jacks are not so easy to move. Works well, great travel distance, low enough for a compact, yet high enough for a four wheel drive. This 3-ton unit is well made and worth the investment. Great grab handles on the sides of the base unit make it easier to adjust the position when underneath the lower framed vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ross

customer_reviews.title: Not balanced weight when lifting jack with the handle
customer_reviews.text: Good floor jack, however it is advertised as portable, but the handles on the sides are not ideally placed. When you hold the handle, the weight is not balanced, so you will be awkwardly holding it diagonally because most of the weight is shifted towards the back. Holding it diagonally hurts your hands. If it was balanced when you hold the handle it would be rated higher.
customer_reviews.author: Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: Where have You Been All My Life
customer_reviews.text: This Floor Jack is the bomb!! Purchase the floor jack to replace 30 yo floor jack couldn't get high enough to raise most SUV's. Twin pump pistons equal fast lift and gets high enough to lift even my Son's F250; yet, light enough to move around with ease. Rubber Jack pad allowed me to lift engine and replace Motor Mount on SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dog

customer_reviews.title: Good jack, not a great rubber pad.
customer_reviews.text: This jack did a great job at lifting my 7,200 pound truck, and an even better job at lifting a standard car. The only issue is that the pad on the lifting member was pretty well destroyed and pulled off after only a few uses. This jack isn’t very light but it’s about what I expected for something heavy duty. If you need a jack to lift a heavy vehicle this is a good jack for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Joy Hammar

customer_reviews.title: Handle should be better, Low floor clearance.
customer_reviews.text: All in all not bad, I gave 3 stars as the handle could be better and ground clearance very low incase you have an uneven floor. I spent a few extra bucks on rubber handle grip and shrink wrap to make it better incase it rubs up against a car to prevent scratching it. (Round Grips-item 9729K76 sold by McMaster-Carr and 35MM Aventik Heat Shrink Sleeve X-Tube Wrap Fishing Rod sold on Amazon) If you plan to use it to move things around, floor clearance is low and jack will hang up if there is a 1/2" drop in your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Why Did I wait So Long...
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to get a good floor jack? To be honest, I'm not a good reviewer for this, as I haven't had other floor jacks to compare to. But 5 stars from me, as it's well machined and works great. The low profile is helpful. I don't care so much about weight, but the aluminum will be nice for avoiding rust in my less than ideal storage conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: It is a bit heavy and the handles are not centered to allow easy one hand lifting
customer_reviews.text: Quality build. It moves up fast. 6 bumps from the lowest point to the highest point. It is a bit heavy and the handles are not centered to allow easy one hand lifting; they will be much more useful if they were positioned towards the back end a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoyu Wang

customer_reviews.title: This jack is used to lift boat trailers with the ...
customer_reviews.text: This jack is used to lift boat trailers with the boats on them. So far it is doing its job with no problems. It lives in the back of a truck until needed. It's light weight and strength was the primary reason I bought the jack since it lives in the back of a truck and must be lifted up, out and back in daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arcan ALJ3T Aluminum 3 Ton Floor Jack
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic, very light weight, low profile and just flat out pretty. I have an all steel 2 ton jack that I’ve used for 30 years and always thought it was a good jack until I got this one. This new aluminum jack has to be over 50% lighter and will lift 1 ton more. Wish I had purchased one of these things years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Randy225

customer_reviews.title: Smooth movement and seems to be well built
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I didn’t order this tool sooner. I have always struggled with holding larger parts up in the air while repairing my vehicles. Tool would have paid for itself in 1 year, keeping me from the headache and struggle of holding parts by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Rimmel

customer_reviews.title: Strong, but lightweight jack.
customer_reviews.text: Great jack. Have used to lift large SUVs and standard size trucks. Manages them no problem. Large jack, solid and easy to maneuver. And it's relatively light. I notice Northern Tools is selling these - suggest you buy from someone else (direct Amazon is usually best).
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Arcan ALJ3T Aluminum Floor Jack - 3 Ton...Minimum for Ram CUMMINS truck weight
customer_reviews.text: Excellynt jack, only used on hard smooth surfaces for 2500 3500 Dodge Ram work. When traveling I take it with me, and my wife can actually remove and carry this from the bed of the truck..... seems to be hanging in there as a travel jack now...
customer_reviews.author: Les J. Mutchie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and built strong
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed this jack is way above what i expected. Built very well and heavy duty. I plan on buying one more to put in my truck tool box.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Used this immediately to rotate tires. Much easier to move around than my old 3 ton Craftsman. Main wheels do not appear to be aluminum and appear to be steel. Will rust on a damp floor. Handles need to be moved to the center of gravity. Instructions are poor. Sticker guy surely failed the quality control class.
customer_reviews.author: JES

customer_reviews.title: 3 ton Lifts great and is light too (compared to steel)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jack. It is A LOT lighter than my old steel 3 ton. I'm going to be comfortable sticking it in the bed of my truck, and I won't need a fork lift to get it on the ground. I used it last weekend to jack up my 3/4 ton truck last weekend, and it didn't slip a cm. I recommend this jack, and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetwiz

customer_reviews.title: Need a lift
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Super light weight. Use it at the track and it is a dream compared to my usual steel 3ton jack.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Luethye

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Jack - Silky Smooth Operation
customer_reviews.text: Yes, made in China, but it has a very high quality look, feel and operation. Nice low profile to get under the Mustang, but enough lift for the Expedition too. Silky smooth release. We'll see how it does in 7 or 8 years - jury still out there. I recommend a hockey puck to supplement the nice rubber insert. The hockey puck gives an extra inch of height, is great to conform a bit to the lifting surface - leaves no dents. And you can buy one from Amazon for just a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: Last floor jack you'll ever need
customer_reviews.text: Best jack I've ever owned. I've had three other jacks before this one, and this is without a doubt the best. Its light for what its capable of (still hefty), and very durable. I feel ridiculous heaping a ton of praise on a floor jack, but it really is that good. I expect my tools to work every time, and so far this jack has stood up to every vehicle I've thrown at it.
customer_reviews.author: Zheng

customer_reviews.title: ... used it once but it seems to be of good construction and the weight is reasonable given that it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pricey and I've only used it once but it seems to be of good construction and the weight is reasonable given that it is made out of aluminium. Actuation of the shaft to release pressure in the cylinder has a fine "ok" point but is much more controllable verses other comparable jacks in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: N. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: a staple in the garage
customer_reviews.text: this is every motorhead staple in the garage. a must have. make it easier to work on your car at home and save you money to do at home rather than going to the dealership or a shop
customer_reviews.author: Duy

customer_reviews.title: Good low clearance and high lifting
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions for first use and have had no issues. Lift height is better than the previous jack I used which has removed an additional lift step I use to need when getting all 4 wheels off the ground. Seems well built and is light for what it is. Almost all aluminum is nice as I live by the ocean and have to worry about rust.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything the manufacturers marketing team described and more. I’m very happy with this purchase and it’s a welcomed addition to my garage. I’m able to life my 2017 Dodge Charger Daytona with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Quacey Elias

customer_reviews.title: Broke After One Use
customer_reviews.text: Cannot recommend this product. It broke after I used it once to switch from summer to winter wheel set. The oil leaked and could no longer jack the car up. Expensive and quality is so-so. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: One of my best ever purchase easy to use best quality
customer_reviews.author: ZIA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jack for 4wd trucks in the garage and driveway
customer_reviews.text: This is the best jack for the money by far, love this thing. I use it to jack up my 67' landcruiser with 37" tires and it lifts it up nice and high off the ground- even though the truck is already sprung over and up kinda high. Super tough jack, bigger than expected but i like big and tough tools like this.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Jegs? Na. Save some $$$ with this
customer_reviews.text: There were some hard edges and other finish fumbles I wasn't terribly excited about but all-in-all a very serviceable version of the same jack Jegs sells with a different fancy paint job and a few dozen dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: NorthernIndyRyan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy lifting made easy
customer_reviews.text: This monster did exactly what I bought it to do. It lifted a 28’ coachman out of the dirt like it was nothing, it had been sitting and rotting for 15 years. So it made a tough job seem easy. Very pleased with the construction, it’s a beast to pick up but it’s as light as a feather when you’re rolling it on a concrete floor. Didn’t have to do any piston adjustments it was ready to work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jack
customer_reviews.text: I owned an older model of this jack and used it for many years. This new one is more streamlined and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: SSC

customer_reviews.title: Reliable. Much lighter than steel.
customer_reviews.text: I love this jack. It fits under my BMW and Tesla. Easy to maneuver and light weigh if you have to loaded in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Ogi

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality jack
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but good tools are like that. I decided to try to avoid "the cheap man pays twice" and it looks like one of my sons will have this someday. A friend recommended an aluminum jack because they are so much easier to move around and he was right. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bair

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a low cost.
customer_reviews.text: Would give it 5stars but getting it via UPS a issue. But everything about this " spin jack is great. Excellent for commercial/everyday use. It's that tough. Very good price & quality.
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: Super solid and light for its size when compared to a metal jack.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad and it turned out to be way nicer and bigger than I anticipated. Great looking, working product so far. This will not see a ton of use so I can't comment how it would hold up in a shop environment. Super solid and light for its size when compared to a metal jack.
customer_reviews.author: Ceeg

customer_reviews.title: Good jack lousy customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am a do it yourself oil change and brakes kind of person I bought this Jack because of the reviews and after 16 months it quit lifting my Subarus. I reached out to arcan and it’s bigger companies sunex and after some time I got an email with a part number that I already knew and the phone number with no name as to who I would be calling
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...a few times.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until the handle would no longer stay engaged making it difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: AKFLHXS

customer_reviews.title: Quality built jack
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this jack for over 3 years now-works the same now as when I bought it.Well constructed jack-quick lift as well.I recommend this jack.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T

customer_reviews.title: looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but it works better. I love the big pad for the contact point and the soft foam pad on the handle to protect your vehicle. Its not extremely heavy but i was expecting it to be a little lighter. Then again, it still beats a bottle jack or a scissor jack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent if you need a good three ton jack.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for price paid. Not too heavy to handle for my 71 year old body. Glad it's aluminum and not steel. Appears well made and all parts are fit together tightly. No problems yet but I've only used it twice. Will report here if it develops major problems before it should.
customer_reviews.author: H. Dinwiddie

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great thusfar
customer_reviews.text: Jack is much lighter than my old steel one that lowered a car as soon as I turned my back. Holds well, weight is heavy but not so bad that you can't carry it. So far after several months of use, it is holding up well and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: David Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: The nicest jack ever, easy to lift ( I’m a lady- lol) Highly recommended. Matches my car which is a plus !
customer_reviews.author: ksm

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: awesome love this jack, light to me at least and, rolls real easily even in grass/pea gravel/dirt. My only thing I'd like to see improved is the height. My old craftsmen 3.5 ton( 30 years old and has been through the ringer) beats it hands down. I think this was really good buy and recommend it coming from an highly skilled auto technician.
customer_reviews.author: gary marrs

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect 👌
customer_reviews.text: Excellent well made and engineered to get things done quick, safe and right... I highly recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: MHG

customer_reviews.title: Too large and cumbersome.
customer_reviews.text: It’s much too heavy and difficult to use. We want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: gigi23

customer_reviews.title: A great deal
customer_reviews.text: just happened to find it for $100 off through a warehouse deal so i had to get it. best jack Ive owned yet. very light weight compared to a Hein-werner which was my only other choice. ive only used it to lift a nissan sentra so far, but works perfectly. and... yeah, it looks cool, as if thats important.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made for Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: At first I balked at the price. But it is made very well and of very high quality. It gets the job done much easier than the 1/2 ton "el cheapo" jack it replaced. And best of all, I can pick it up easier than if it were all steel. It is great value for my dollars spent.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: Changed my life. Miles ahead of my old auto parts store jack that had 10" of lift. If you frequently work on cars or trucks buy this jack.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Floor Jack -  Strong, Well Made and Low
customer_reviews.text: I love this jack! It is well made, easy to pump and gets under vehicles with very low ground clearances. My only complaint is...I wish I bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Swhatszup

customer_reviews.title: Nice. So far so good. Light and works well.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Slow to lift once it is up to contact the vehicle. Still nice though cannot complain. Replacing a 2 ton sears jack from 1984.

customer_reviews.title: Great floor jack.
customer_reviews.text: Just opened up the box for the floor jack and tested with my lowed car and i was amazed that it cleared the front bumper. I'm really glad I purchase this floor jack. I also tried it with my silverado truck and work really good. it raised the truck fast. I'm not a mechanic by trade and don't really know how the expensive jack in the market work's, but i know this is a lot better than Craftsman that i owned. so far it didn't leak on me. i have used it for ten times now.
customer_reviews.author: desiree verano

customer_reviews.title: the aluminum design makes it super light and easy to maneuver around the shop
customer_reviews.text: This is the jack I have been looking for. It gets heavily used in a commercial setting and is still hold up. It's low profile enough to get under any factory height vehicle, but has enough power to lift 1 ton trucks as well. the aluminum design makes it super light and easy to maneuver around the shop.
customer_reviews.author: deus402

customer_reviews.title: Great jack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jack. The best I’ve used. Lightweight and will hold a car up forever without leak down.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Quite good jack
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit pricy, but I am rather satisfied. When I bought this jack I was a little bit nervous because some reviews said it was weak or that bent. However, this is a rather tough tool. I have used it continuously for months and it still performs as the first days I got it. The only criticism I have is that it is a bit heavier than what I thought for being made of aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: GAPS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jack!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this Jack! It is lightweight, yet sturdy and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Super light.
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a jack. Easy the throw in back seat of my car!
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Light and strong!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. It’s light and easy to lift my car in only a few pumps!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only used on one job so far. Very strong, low profile but still enough height to get my pick up off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: dom.r

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional mechanic. This jack is the envy of all my work friends, for the at home lift. Lifts the front end of the F250 super duty no problem. Great to carry, easy to lift into the bed of a truck for side jobs. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Buell

customer_reviews.title: Like it so much I bought a second!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one about 3 years ago. Started doing tire rotations at home every oil change instead of taking my car back to the tire place for the free rotations. With just one jack and the use of jack stands it was taking a little longer and sometimes got a little sketchy. Now with 2 matching jacks it's a breeze. Both have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: HMM

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality jack. Lighter than most! But still heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I Used it a total of two times, once on a F150 and a Grand prix. On my third attempt to use it the release valve malfunctioned and wouldn't lock the pump. Called customer service only to get a machine that gave out two options, in which those options weren't about a jack. However customer service did respond rapidly via email.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this jack four or five times, but I have no complaints. It's been working great. Performs as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: KirkHere2

customer_reviews.title: Save your back!
customer_reviews.text: My 60 year old dad needed a lighter jack! I have used it a couple times myself and was very impressed with the maneuverability and capability!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Grebinger

customer_reviews.title: The arcan aluminum jack
customer_reviews.text: This aluminum jack is excellent. I can move the jack around with no problem and it pumps up with very little handle movement. Some jacks you have to go down little further with the handle, but this one doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius Butler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, lightweight, durable and perfect for lifted truck or lowered car.
customer_reviews.text: Love this jack. Well worth the money. Just wish they had a case to keep it in so it doesn't slide all around my bed. Great for my 8" lifted duramax and could be used for a low car as well.
customer_reviews.author: Derick Buffard

customer_reviews.title: customer service nonexistent
customer_reviews.text: product broke 2nd use within warranty contacted twice no response. The most I EVER spent on a jack and it is unusable
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Wegrynowski

customer_reviews.title: it is just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: this is the one! heavy duty construction means: heavy, well built, solid, usable.
customer_reviews.author: Wyllie

customer_reviews.title: It's a beast!
customer_reviews.text: You could jack up a house with this. It's a beast for sure. However, it's very heavy even if it is aluminum so don't go thinking you will carry it all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Menke

customer_reviews.title: Very good jack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, a great jack for a great price, no problems at all using it, works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just changed both the front and back shocks using this with no problems or concerns
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: If you ever have to transport a Jack or store it this is not light but beats carrying a steel one.
customer_reviews.text: If you ever have to transport a Jack or store it this is not light but beats carrying a steel one. I should have bought this a long time ago. I have carried steel 3 ton floor jacks and I hated how my hands would be cut in to while carrying them. This floor jack is so much nicer. The cut aluminum looks awesome. This Jack works great.
customer_reviews.author: _/__ Fun Meter

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Broke within the first hour. I couldn't tighten it to hold the jack in place, not safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would NOT buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.text: For an aluminum jack it weighs just as much as my steel jack. And straining to lift my car. The only good thing is Amazon gave $100 credit to open a charge card. It is sturdily made.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: Works very well ! I would buy this brand again !
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The only down side is the size. If you have enough room to store it, I would say go for it. This jack is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Good jack, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I used the jack today and I really liked the ease of operation. It's a little heavy, but I'll get over it. All in all, I am pleased with this jack.
customer_reviews.author: DPG70

customer_reviews.title: How easy and weightless this jack was
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver and when it came down to lifting my SUV it did it effortlessly, I could not see my self not recommending this easy to lift and use auto jack. The only issue I found was with myself not buying it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Customer68

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice jack, heavier than I thought it would be. That’s not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stanc770

customer_reviews.title: Very good jack
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hope for. Strong, light and easily manipulated. Very good
customer_reviews.author: Fromeous

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Aluminum Floor Jack
customer_reviews.text: There are a great deal of bad reviews out there for these type of aluminum jacks, but I need to complement the manufacturer of this particular jack as it appears to be very well built. I have only had it about a month, but I have used it twice now, and it is a joy to use. The weight is perfect, and it fits the jack points of my Prowler perfectly, which was a gamble as the car sits so low, and the jack points are critical on the car as the frame is all aluminum. Great price and great floor jack.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Alustiza

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t got to use it
customer_reviews.text: The jack wouldn't lift, called customer service and now they’re sending my a warranty pump. Already tried to bleed it and put more hydraulic fluid. I have to fix a brand new jack even before i use it. Should've just gone to harbor freight.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jack
customer_reviews.text: Love this jack! Used it for several months now and since it's a 3-ton capacity, it can lift my car fairly easily. Very sturdy and it allows me to lower the car as slow as I want. Much heavier than I thought but I only use it in my garage so weight doesn't matter much for me. If I needed a jack to take to the track or something, then I'd prefer to get something lighter to save my back.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

product_meta.title: Arcan 3-Ton Quick Rise Aluminum Floor Jack with Dual Pump Pistons & Reinforced Lifting Arm (ALJ3T)
product_meta.description: The Arcan ALJS3 3-Ton Steel Jack Stands has an overall 3-Ton lifting capacity and a working range of 11-5/8 in. to 17.5 in. A counterweighted pawl locks in place securely to prevent slipping, while allowing easy adjustments. A large contoured saddle with locating lugs helps support and position vehicle frame. The wide stance base delivers superior stability and includes base pads that prevents the jack from sinking into asphalt and provide stable footing for the jack stands. The welded construction and alloyed steel offer years of support. Arcan puts all of our lifting equipment through voluntary and rigorous third party safety testing, as outlined by the ASME PASE-2014 Safety Standard for Portable Automotive Service Equipment, to ensure that our products are among the safest on the market.
feature_bullets: LIGHTWEIGHT AIRCRAFT-GRADE ALUMINUM: Allows for easy maneuverability.
DUAL PUMP PISTONS: Quickly raises the floor jack saddle to load.
REINFORCED LIFT ARM: Increases strength, chassis torsion control, and durability.
VEHICLE PROTECTION: Designed with a rubber saddle and a foam handle bumper.
SIDE-MOUNT HANDLE: Allows for convenient jack positioning.
2 PIECE HANDLE: Allows for easy storage.
BYPASS AND OVERLOAD VALVES: Prevents over-extension of hydraulic ram and jack use beyond rated capacity.
COMPLIES WITH ASME PASE-2014 SAFETY STANDARD: We put all of our lifting equipment through a voluntary and rigorous safety certification process.
Designed with dual pump pistons, a reinforced lift arm, a side-mount handle, and bypass and overload valves.
